content: WOW ... if it weren't for my iPhone not listening to whatever the hell thunderbird or tbsync (or both) are doing, it appears I would have lost everything permanently, probably including my entire calendar and contacts list BUT I STILL CANNOT GET THEM BACK INTO THUNDERBIRD ... not even with a fresh install and not importing anything but just deleting the whole thing including the appdata profile folder, and starting from scratch ... somehow, despite the icloud server retaining the information, thunderbird refuses to download it, and is for some reason only fetching inbox and deleted and local folders containing another deleted plus outbox ... and if I try to recreate the same folders, it just does nothing ... this is a seriously bad flaw in the design
creator: galacticpresident
